author: gargiulo.gianni
title: Stakeboard: Social Staking Platform
description: To support a growing number of prosperous SPOs, delegating needs to be easier, more informative, more trust-inspiring, and more lucrative.
solution: Stakeboard is a social staking marketplace designed to promote decentralization by improving key aspects of Cardano's staking landscape.
experience:
2 Tech leads: CTOs, founded multiple start-ups; SPOs; Plutus Pioneers, Emurgo Academy
Senior Designer
Business Development Lead
